text.text: "Anybody wanna buy a pug? I accept all currencies; Water, meth, Chuck E Cheese tokens... I'll find you."
"Anyone ever find it weird how most of the weapons we find in gun stores are over a hundred years old?"
"The porcelain spire beckons for me... I must."
"I saw a fucking ring-tailed lemur running around earlier. Did the wildlife sanctuaries release all their animals when the world ended?"
"I had to eat a pug today. I feel wrong."
"I saw a black pug fighting off zombies today. Surprisingly strong creature."
"I saw a guy with no face in the basement. No not that one, this one looked like a hobo"
"Every day it feels like another apocalypse hits. Zombies, entities, aliens..."
"We survive because the invaders hate each other more than us"
"I swear I saw something like these Perfection fuckers in an old card game..."
"An RV crashed through one of those portals. Killed a shoggoth as it did. Some guy came out and offered us a pug. Trust Paul, Paul seems alright.."
"God damn it, the boss is gonna be so mad. A catgirl stole my damned van, all because I had to piss..."
"Heard some stupid idiot go on about how 'humans are the real monsters'. Okay Sharon, but have you considered the flesh eating dead? How about the invading porcelain fuckwads?"
